mapper.insert: insert into user(user_id, user_pw, user_name, user_email, user_username, user_date) values(#{user_id}, #{user_pw}, #{user_name}, #{user_email}, #{user_username}, now())
mapper.select: select user_no, user_id, user_pw, user_name, user_email ,user_username, user_date, ROLE from user where user_id = #{user_id} and ROLE = #{ROLE}
